title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Production in billion cubic meters, with a total of 20 data points.
Overall Production in billion cubic meters has increased over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
Max Production in billion cubic meters about 831.8 was recorded at Year 2018
Min Production in billion cubic meters about 511.1 was recorded at Year 2005
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Production in billion cubic meters, with a total of 20 data points. The chart has 6 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2007 to 2016.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2016 to 2018.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2005 to 2007.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2003 to 2005.
But, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2001 to 2003.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 1998 to 2001.
